phrases: I am sure that I will never forget...
We once lived in a hopelessly sweet, miraculous time.
The name of that brilliant time was...
Probably...
I am sure...

sore wa sore wa chiisai te de aozora wo aoida

aki ni nari mata fuyu ni nari hitotsu toshi wo totta

My hometown lay buried in snow the morning I was born.
I looked up at the blue sky with my tiny hands.
The face of the girl next door that I have known so well...
It is as familiar as the graduation canon.
Thriving in solitude has been mistaken as my life story.
I want to blame it on someone.
It is so difficult.
No, I hate it.
Tears and sorrow caused me to miss my chance.
Autumn passed, winter came again, and I became a year older.
You think you have run far away, but your story never ends.
And yet, you are smirking.
It is so cowardly.
I hate it.
Even if I have to cling to you, chase after you, and get kicked down...
It is so cowardly.
No...
It is so difficult.
I hate it.
I hate it.
Our time together started in an apartment building...
Back then, unable to find my way in life, I was drifting about...
Yo, Takemoto.
I bought bentos for us at the convenience store, so let us eat them together.
Mayama-san!
What?
Food?
Revived!
Do you have mine?
I will eat anything!
W-What are you doing, Morita-san?
I do not care!
Give
Me the chicken!
Whoa, Morita-san!
But those ordinary days with the people I love were also enjoyable.
Morita-san!
Takemoto...
Nice, Takemoto!
They were fun...
Food!
And during that time...
I met you...
Hagu-chan...
My love for you began back then.
And I am sure it was the same for Morita-san.
But we were not the only ones who had begun to revolve.
Mayama!
Guard!
You still have not gotten over her?
Hurry up and end it!
Yamada...
Actually, how many more girls will have to cry for you to be satisfied?
Yamada!
Yamada!
Yamada!
Say...
Why is it me?
No matter how much you blow steam at me...
I probably will not change.
You are better off finding another guy.
You should stop looking at me.
Hello?
Sure, I will be there right away.
Well, I have got work to do.
You idiot...
Mayama, you idiot!
Yamada-san's feelings...
Mayama-san's feelings...
It was a terrible accident.
If a passing truck driver had not pulled Rika out, she would have burned up, too.
Rika was the one driving.
Because of that event, I lost my best friend and Rika's husband at once.
Hey, Yamada...
Grab on tight.
You will fall off.
Hey, Yamada...
Why did you fall in love with me?
You are precious to me.
So, I have been thinking that I needed to turn you down properly if you ever told me that you liked me.
But...
I thought that you would go away somewhere if I turned you down.
When I looked at you, it hurt me because it was like looking at myself.
I thought, Ah, I wonder if I look like that from Rika-san's perspective...
Uncool and persistent...
But that does not matter anymore.
Even thought I tried to act cool, I could not change a thing.
And I am still uncool.
And I was not able to give up on her.
Yamada, did you just drool on me?
Mayama, I love you!
I love you!
Yeah.
I love you so much!
Yeah.
I love you!
Yeah.
Mayama, I love you!
Yeah.
I love you!
Yeah.
I love you so much!
Yeah.
Thank you.
H-Hey, Takemoto...
Is H-Hagu f-f-friends with Morita now?
Well, I do not know how Hagu-chan feels...
But Morita-san probably...
Sensei, please do not ask me that...
I am begging you... not that...
Were you able to buy what you wanted?
Did Morita leave already?
W-Was it fun?
It was not fun...
It was not fun at all.
It was hard to keep up with him...
And when I wanted to go to the restroom, I could not tell him for the longest time.
Hagu...
I could not even remember what I needed.
I could not say it at all...
I mean, the whole time, I wanted to come back as soon as possible!
I do not like that!
I would much rather be with you, Shuu-chan!
I would like it much better!
You are so naive... it is obviously because you like him.
I have found you!
Why you, Hagusuke, Chibi-Hamus!
It is been a while, has not it?
Have you been well?
Yeah?
That is great!
What is it?
Say something.
Want some sunflower seeds?
You do not seem to be well.
It is kind of cold today, is not it?
That is right!
Here.
Look!
A rolled mouse!
Even so, why is it, Morita-san...?
You moron!
What the hell are you thinking?
I do not get it!
Why are you always being so selfish?
You will lose all of them like this!
Do not you get it?!
Morita-san left for America...
Hagu-chan, do you want Morita-san to come back?
Or do you not?
What is wrong, Takemoto-kun?
Hey, what good will asking her that do?
Please tell me.
I do not want him to.
I do not want him to come back.
I think it is good to keep trying until you have tried everything you have wanted to do.
Morita-san left for America, and Hagu-chan continued to draw.
But I was not able to do anything...
After graduating from college, Mayama-san started working for a design company.
And love was slowly starting to revolve there as well.
Oh yeah, Mayama...
Yes?
Remember that bowl that you made at your school for the restaurant on Omote-Sandou?
We have had other customers order that.
They want something similar.
Wow, that is amazing, Mayama.
Not really, I had a friend of mine make that for me.
Yamada-san, right?
There are things I want to ask her to make as well.
Can you introduce me to this Yamada-san next time?
Oh, well...
I will ask her myself.
But I will have to talk to her about money...
The specifications are more detailed this time around.
I should talk to her in person...
It will be no problem as long as you give me the budget report.
Please leave the rest up to me.
Here you go, Yamada-san.
Is it really okay?
Huh?
Why do you know my name?
My name is Nomiya.
It is nice to meet you.
Thank you for that bowl the other day.
It was well-received.
You really helped us out.
He is a cool-looking guy.
That is the problem!
But I do not get it.
Why are you interfering with us when you are interested in someone else, Mayama?
Yamada-san's feelings for you are obvious to even us, so there is no way you have not noticed, right?
And you are not pushing her away, but rather, you are tormenting her.
Maybe it is that you want to keep her on the bench, in case your first choice does not work out?
What do you mean by that?
I will take the unspoiled Yamada-san if Rika-san does not work out.
Thinking something like that?
I am not.
Really?
Not at all.
You said it.
You said that you are not.
We are running.
H-Huh?
Okay!
Hey...!
Yamada... Nomiya-san...
You know about Rika-san, right?
Are you just waiting for them to fall apart while you complain and sulk, Yamada-san?
P-Please stop.
It has nothing to do with you, Nomiya-san!
It does not?
Even though you used me to attract Mayama's attention?
You are sure being selfish...
How much longer will you keep testing Mayama?
Well, I do understand your position...
An unrequited love that is emerged is unproductive, but simple...
Your infatuation makes him feel guilty, so he is nice to you.
And nothing worse could possibly happen...
Please stop!
Nor will you be hurt anymore...
Stop it!
What is it about Mayama that you like, Yamada-san?
I do not know.
If my love for him is genuine, I should be able to wish for his happiness.
But I... Just like you said in the car earlier...
I had honestly... been hoping they would fall apart...
This whole time... this whole time...
Yeah...
Please have some while it is hot.
Why, Mayama-kun?
Did not I tell you when I left this place?
That I will come back, even if you are not waiting?
I already said this at the hospital, but I will say it again.
Please employ me at Harada Design.
I should be more useful than I was before.
The same thing will happen.
I will end up hurting you again...
It is okay, you can hurt me.
Because I will not be hurt.
I had not realized what had happened...
And that did not change at all, even when Morita-san came back from America.
I am... incapable of doing anything.
I started pedaling without a goal...
I was afraid this whole time.
I was afraid of not knowing the future.
I was afraid of not knowing what I wanted to do.
I was afraid of myself for not knowing what I wanted to do.
And I was afraid of the days that were nevertheless flying by mercilessly.

ki no sei da to satorazu ni irareta nara
If only I had not realized that I imagined it.
sandal-baki no ashiyubi ni mitoreta I was charmed by your toes in your sandals...
Always... I would always thought...
chiisana hana sakaseta...while we tended to that small flower.
How far can I go without looking back?

That was love.
That was the reason I started riding.
I finally understood that reason.

chachi na yume no sekai mo sugu ni hirogatte iku yo...and my simple dream world will quickly expand...
How precious they were...
kimi wa iroasenu mama...but you will stay vivid in my dreams.
What was the end of this land like?
ameagari no kirema kara Shining through between the clouds after the rain...
There was nothing there.
But...
sashikomu hi no hikaritachi machi wo arau
The rays of sunshine bathe the city.
The sky was so beautiful...
That is why I decided to come back.

But I was feeling blue somewhere inside.
are wa koi datta
That was love.
Hagu-chan...
I am in love with you.
Takemoto-kun, thank you for coming back.
And so...
We all start to revolve again.
We start to revolve again...
arifurete iru kimochi nante sa
It would be so much easier...
nanimo iwazu ni isso kieteshimaeba
raku ni nareru no ni
sorezore no michi wo yuku sono wakaremichi
At the crossroads where we split ways...
mou nidoto au koto no nai deai wa kanashisugiru
tarinai kimochi wo mochiyotte
Despite adding the emotions that are lacking...
atatameta saki kara hieteitte
sonna hazu naitte shinjiteru
